page.title: 05Garvald Farms
page.content: The main farms in the area are Baro, (Carfrae & Danskine run as one unit) Garvald Mains, Nunraw, Stoneypath Tower, (Tanderlane incorporating Garvald Grange, which is run as a small pony farm) and snawdon. Most of the land lies between 400' and 1300' in the hillfoot area of the Lammermuirs. Much of the underlying rock is old red sandstone, but it is often overlaid with glacial gravels which although stoney is well drained and productive. The acreage of the farms is big, ranging from 250 to 1500 acres. The land is highly cultivated- steep brae faces are sown in grass using crawler type machines. Many fences between fields have been removed and the gates widened to allow the most modern machinery to be used. However, perimiter stone walls have been retained where possible.
